name: Need for Drift
description:
====== Need for Drift ======
Player 1:
Accelerate: W
Brake: S
Steer: A/D
Handbrake: Space
Shoot Laser: E
Shoot Rocket: Q
Use Boost: Shift

Player 2:
Accelerate: UP
Brake: DOWN
Steer: LEFT/RIGHT
Handbrake: L
Shoot Laser: J
Shoot Rocket: K
Use Boost: P

====== Gameplay Instructions ======
Two players are each given
a vehicle. The goal is to
kill the other player. There
is no score or time limit.
